nodes.text: The Separatist Heavy Speeder was a Separatist experimental repulsorcraft developed during the Clone Wars. It was going to be tested on Nothoiin, however, the Galactic Republic managed to liberate Nothoiin before the Separatists could even unpack it. When the Separatist forces retreated from the planet, they left the repulsorcraft behind, thus falling in the Republic's hands.
